Hypenotic The Jekyll Butler

I’ll Take Favourite Moustache for 100 Alex

16 Nov 2010

Our friends at The Bait Shop operate a business that is simultaneously a skateboarding and artistic hub, a store, a screen printing operation and a gallery. They sum it up best when they call themselves “a multi-faceted place of business and leisure.”

Baitshop co-owners Ken and Greg jumped on the opportunity to join forces with Hypenotic and Mildred’s Temple Kitchen to throw and awesome Movember party in support of Prostate Cancer Canada.

In this video, The Baitshop boys talk about why they’re getting behind Movember and celebrating The Great Canadian Moustache at Mildred’s Temple Kitchen. They’ll be at the party displaying artworks featuring our favourite Moustached Canadians and screening t-shirts with the images on site–all available to you.

Have you bought your tickets yet? They’re only $25 and there’s limited capacity, so buy your tickets NOW.
